Articles.Content:
For some unknown reason the contracts system has stopped working, the mission control screen doesn't display any information. I ran into this problem a few days ago and found out that it was being caused by Custom Biomes, after removing it the contracts returned. Today the issue is back despite Custom Biomes having been removed. The only things added to my install are Kerbal Construction Time, which I've used before, ColliderFX and the latest version of Texture Replacer which was updated from 2.0 to 2.0.1.

Removing these three mods does not remedy the problem and the problem persists even on a new game.

Output log follows.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0ByGL27vfpnFqLVFVYU1fU0dReWc/edit?usp=docslist_api
There are stock issues that break the Contracts system. Have you tried rebuilding the contract database using the debug menu?

Yes, it doesn't work.

If I remove all the mods in my game then the contracts work. This is happening with a brand new save so it isn't the bug where removing a mod that adds contracts breaks existing saves.
